name: Panda Power
description:
Panda Power is an innovative platform game that combines Story Mode with D.I.Y Mode. Are you ready to start the adventure with Kung Fu master?

CREATE YOUR OWN D.I.Y MAPS!
Let your imagination run wild in Panda Power! Create and share your very own unique D.I.Y maps in the Panda Land!
BE WHO YOU WANT TO BE!
Jump and run with Panda Man Four in the various mysterious lands! Choose who you would like to be with different power!
EXPLORE THE PANDA LAND!
Discover all the different levels in Panda Power! Enjoy yourself on different terrific, wonderfully designed worlds with multiple levels.

Panda Power stands out with:
+ 2 Game Play options
*Story Mode--Choose a scene to challenge yourself
*Edit Mode--Catch people's eyes with your unique DIY maps
+ 2 Game Mode options--Normal Mode & Hard Mode
+ Unlock cool new Characters
+ Explore various mysterious lands with difficulty levels
+ Share your progress with your friends on Facebook
+ Classic platform game style with modern playability
+ Wonderful animations and game graphics

Join us on the Panda Power Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/playpandapower

Visit website for tips:
http://www.playpandapower.com/

We hope you enjoy the game.
Have fun!!! :)
